conclusion: Remainder inadmissible;Violation of Art. 5-1;Violation of Art. 5-4;Violation of Art. 5-5;Non-pecuniary damage - award
docname: CASE OF ŽIROVNICKÝ v. THE CZECH REPUBLIC
